      • host

        protected String host

      • http

        protected io.higgs.http.client.HttpRequestBuilder http
        This instance should be used as a base for configurations. All new requests should use HttpRequestBuilder.copy() Although a single instance would work, this keeps things simple and ensures no stale data is passed in subsequent requests. It is also very cheap in terms of Netty's thread usage because Higgs re-uses the same event loop group so it'll never be creating a whole new load of resources for each instance.

      • versionPrefix

        protected String versionPrefix

      • urlEncodingFormat

        protected String urlEncodingFormat

        public String protocol()

      • baseURL

        public URI baseURL()
        Returns:
        A base URL to the DataSift API. e.g. https://api.datasift.com/v1/

      • newAPIEndpointURI

        public URI newAPIEndpointURI(String endpoint)
        Generate a new URI object given an endpoint relative to the base url of this configuration. For example, if the base URL is https://api.datasift.com/v1/ and the endpoint parameters is validate this will return the URI https://api.datasift.com/v1/validate. Technically any path acceptable by URI.resolve(String) is acceptable
        Parameters:
        endpoint - the endpoint to return a URI for.
        Returns:
        a new URI with the resolved URL that is safe to manipulate

      • newAPIEndpointURI

        public URI newAPIEndpointURI(URI endpoint)
        Generate a new URI object given an endpoint relative to the base url of this configuration. For example, if the base URL is https://api.datasift.com/v1/ and the endpoint parameters is validate this will return the URI https://api.datasift.com/v1/validate. Technically any path acceptable by URI.resolve(URI) is acceptable
        Parameters:
        endpoint - the endpoint to return a URI for.
        Returns:
        a new URI with the resolved URL that is safe to manipulate
